title: Doctor
message:

title: Animals

title: Petition

title: Planting trees
message:

title: Water
message:
Yo, man? Can you hook me up with some H2O? This heat's on fire, you feel me?

title: Delivery
message:
Hey you! We need to deliver this heart for transplant as soon as possible! I really don't know why it was sent via courier... But there's no time to waste. Get in the car!
Cost: %s coins
Reward: %s hearts

title: Dinner
message:
Good morning boss! Would you be so kind to buy me something to eat? I haven't had anything in my stomach for 2 days...
Cost: %s coins
